00023 #include <stdlib.h>
00024 #include <stdio.h>
00025 #include <string.h>
00026 #include <stdarg.h>
00027 #include "types.h"
00028 #include "globals.h"
00029 #include "ezxml.h"
00030 #include "read_xml_config_file.h"
00031 #include "read_xml_util.h"
00032 
00033 config_t configuration;
00034 
00035 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036  * (function: read_config_file)
00037  * This reads an XML config file that specifies what we will do in the tool.
00038  *
00039  * See config_t in types.h to see the data structures used in this read.
00040  *-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00041 void read_config_file(char *file_name)
00042 {
00043         ezxml_t doc, next;
00044 
00045         /* Parse the xml file */
00046         oassert(file_name != NULL);
00047         doc = ezxml_parse_file(file_name);
00048 
00049         if (doc == NULL) 
00050         {
00051                 printf("error: could not parse xml configuration file\n");
00052                 return;
00053         }
00054 
00055         /* Root element should be config */
00056         CheckElement(doc, "config");
00057 
00058         /* Process the verilog files */
00059         next = FindElement(doc, "verilog_files", TRUE);
00060         read_verilog_files(next, &configuration);
00061         FreeNode(next);
00062 
00063         /* Process the output */
00064         next = FindElement(doc, "output", TRUE);
00065         read_outputs(next, &configuration);
00066         FreeNode(next);
00067 
00068         /* Process the optimizations */
00069         next = FindElement(doc, "optimizations", FALSE);
00070         read_optimizations(next, &configuration);
00071         FreeNode(next);
00072 
00073         /* Process the debug switches */
00074         next = FindElement(doc, "debug_outputs", TRUE);
00075         read_debug_switches(next, &configuration);
00076         FreeNode(next);
00077 
00078         /* Release the full XML tree */
00079         FreeNode(doc);
00080         return;
00081 }
00082 
00083 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084  * (function: read_verilog_files)
00085  *-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00086 void read_verilog_files(ezxml_t a_node, config_t *config)
00087 {
00088         ezxml_t child;
00089         ezxml_t junk;
00090 
00091         child = ezxml_child(a_node, "verilog_file");
00092         while (child != NULL)
00093         {
00094                 config->list_of_file_names = (char**)realloc(config->list_of_file_names, sizeof(char*)*(config->num_list_of_file_names+1));
00095                 config->list_of_file_names[config->num_list_of_file_names] = strdup(ezxml_txt(child));
00096                 config->num_list_of_file_names ++;
00097                 ezxml_set_txt(child, "");
00098                 junk = child;
00099                 child = ezxml_next(child);
00100                 FreeNode(junk);
00101         }
00102         return;
00103 }
00104 
00105 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00106  * (function: read_outputs)
00107  *------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00108 void read_outputs(ezxml_t a_node, config_t *config)
00109 {
00110         ezxml_t child;
00111 
00112         child = ezxml_child(a_node, "output_type");
00113         if (child != NULL)
00114         {
00115                 config->output_type = strdup(ezxml_txt(child));
00116                 ezxml_set_txt(child, "");
00117                 FreeNode(child);
00118         }
00119 
00120         child = ezxml_child(a_node, "output_path_and_name");
00121         if (child != NULL)
00122         {
00123                 global_args.output_file = strdup(ezxml_txt(child));
00124                 ezxml_set_txt(child, "");
00125                 FreeNode(child);
00126         }
00127 
00128         child = ezxml_child(a_node, "target");
00129         if (child != NULL)
00130         {
00131                 ezxml_t junk = child;
00132 
00133                 child = ezxml_child(child, "arch_file");
00134                 if (child != NULL)
00135                 {
00136                         global_args.arch_file = strdup(ezxml_txt(child));
00137                         ezxml_set_txt(child, "");
00138                         FreeNode(child);
00139                 }
00140                 FreeNode(junk);
00141         }
00142         return;
00143 }
00144 
00145 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00146  * (function: read_workload_generation)
00147  *------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00148 void read_debug_switches(ezxml_t a_node, config_t *config)
00149 {
00150         ezxml_t child;
00151 
00152         child = ezxml_child(a_node, "output_ast_graphs");
00153         if (child != NULL)
00154         {
00155                 config->output_ast_graphs = atoi(ezxml_txt(child));
00156                 ezxml_set_txt(child, "");
00157                 FreeNode(child);
00158         }
00159 
00160         child = ezxml_child(a_node, "output_netlist_graphs");
00161         if (child != NULL)
00162         {
00163                 config->output_netlist_graphs = atoi(ezxml_txt(child));
00164                 ezxml_set_txt(child, "");
00165                 FreeNode(child);
00166         }
00167 
00168         child = ezxml_child(a_node, "debug_output_path");
00169         if (child != NULL)
00170         {
00171                 config->debug_output_path = strdup(ezxml_txt(child));
00172                 ezxml_set_txt(child, "");
00173                 FreeNode(child);
00174         }
00175 
00176         return;
00177 }
00178 
00179 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00180  * (function: read_optimizations)
00181  *------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00182 void read_optimizations(ezxml_t a_node, config_t *config)
00183 {
00184         const char *prop;
00185         ezxml_t child;
00186 
00187         child = ezxml_child(a_node, "multiply");
00188         if (child != NULL)
00189         {
00190                 prop = FindProperty(child, "size", FALSE);
00191                 if (prop != NULL)
00192                 {
00193                         config->min_hard_multiplier = atoi(prop);
00194                         ezxml_set_attr(child, "size", NULL);
00195                 }
00196                 else /* Default: No minimum hard multiply size */
00197                         config->min_hard_multiplier = 0;
00198                 
00199                 prop = FindProperty(child, "fixed", FALSE);
00200                 if (prop != NULL)
00201                 {
00202                         config->fixed_hard_multiplier = atoi(prop);
00203                         ezxml_set_attr(child, "fixed", NULL);
00204                 }
00205                 else /* Default: No fixed hard multiply size */
00206                         config->fixed_hard_multiplier = 0;
00207         }
00208         FreeNode(child);
00209 
00210         return;
00211 }
